name: ORACLE (itch) (akirassasin)
description:
ORACLE

concept artist: ayumaruu._
everything else: akirassasin

In his dying moments after his defeat, the vengeful necromancer cursed the land. As the only Oracle amongst the few immune to the curse, decide which knights should be dispatched to destroy the undead crystals deep within various castles. 

Predict the outcomes of various knight combinations by Dreaming, then choose the best path ahead... or take the risk in moments where guidance may fail you.
